thread.section_title: OLDIES.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OLDIES.com | oldies.com | 2 of 406
thread.title: Ben Kauffman

author: Ben Kauffman
title: Ben Kauffman
text: I bought about a dozen dvd's from Oldies.com. in 2 orders. They were all popular older movies like Ferris Bueller and King Kong. I paid around $110 for all of them and paid no shipping or tax. Three items were backordered but I received them in a separate shipment about a week later and was not charged any shipping. All orders arrived quickly and were in perfect condition. Great selection, service and price. I couldn't be happier. I will be a regular customer.
